short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the most accurate real-time weather in your location of choosing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal weather companion right in your browser. Our Chrome extension provides you with the most up-to-date weather information, hourly, daily, and weekly forecasts, and even personalized alerts to keep you prepared for any weather condition.
